. /**********************************************************************/
. /* Replication Stata do file for "Does Performance Matter? Evaluating */
. /* Political Selection along the Chinese Administrative Ladder"       */  
. /* Xiaobo Lu, Pierre Landry, Haiyan Duan                              */
. /* June 2017                                                           */
. /* This file analyzes the county-level dataset for the results reported*/
. /* in the main manuscript and the online appendix              */
. /**********************************************************************/
. 
. 
. 
. # delimit;
delimiter now ;
. clear;

. clear matrix;

. clear mata;

. set matsize 3000;

. set maxvar 10000;


. set more off;

. /* Tables 3 & 5 Promotion of Party Secretaries upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to Competitors) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen sec_id=group(dlat dlong ccp_sec);
(2314 missing values generated)

. drop if sec_id==.;
(2314 observations deleted)

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size  sec_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_t
> ax1_gr_ps rk_gdp_gr_ps (max) sec_promotion sec_position_next_year pref_id year (last) prov_id county_type_id sec_pw_pref sec_ag
> e, by(sec_id);

. /* Generate nonlinear terms for year in office and age*/
> gen sec_age2=sec_age*sec_age;
(4285 missing values generated)

. gen sec_tty2=sec_tty*sec_tty;

. /* Delete right censoring: people do not have position change next year in 2007 */
> drop if sec_position_next_year==0;

. /* Delete left censoring: people have position change before 1999 */
> drop if year<1999;

. /* Tables 4 & 6 Promotion of County Heads upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to Competitors) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen mayor_id=group(dlat dlong mayor);
(2524 missing values generated)

. drop if mayor_id==.;
(2524 observations deleted)

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size mayor_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_

. /* Table A1 & A3: Promotion of Party Secretaries upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to Competitors; Excludi
> ng Top and Bottom Performing Jurisdictions) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen sec_id=group(dlat dlong ccp_sec);
(2314 missing values generated)

. drop if sec_id==.;
(2314 observations deleted)

. /* Drop top 10% and bottom 10% jurisdiction in terms of tax collection per capita */
> sort prov_py pref_ch county_id;

. by prov_py pref_ch county_id: egen all_tax_pc1_avg=mean(all_tax_pc1);
(212 missing values generated)

. by prov_py pref_ch: egen all_tax_pc1_avg_90=pctile(all_tax_pc1_avg), p(90);
(8 missing values generated)

. by prov_py pref_ch: egen all_tax_pc1_avg_10=pctile(all_tax_pc1_avg), p(10);
(8 missing values generated)

. by prov_py pref_ch: keep if all_tax_pc1_avg<all_tax_pc1_avg_90 & all_tax_pc1_avg>all_tax_pc1_avg_10;
(10102 observations deleted)

. sort prov_py pref_ch sec_id year;

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size  sec_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_t

. /* Table A2 & A4: Promotion of County heads upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to Competitors; Excluding To
> p and Bottom Performing Jurisdictions) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen mayor_id=group(dlat dlong mayor);
(2524 missing values generated)

. drop if mayor_id==.;
(2524 observations deleted)

. /* Drop top 10% and bottom 10% jurisdiction in terms of tax collection per capita */
> sort prov_py pref_ch county_id;

. by prov_py pref_ch county_id: egen all_tax_pc1_avg=mean(all_tax_pc1);
(207 missing values generated)

. by prov_py pref_ch: egen all_tax_pc1_avg_90=pctile(all_tax_pc1_avg), p(90);
(8 missing values generated)

. by prov_py pref_ch: egen all_tax_pc1_avg_10=pctile(all_tax_pc1_avg), p(10);
(8 missing values generated)

. by prov_py pref_ch: keep if all_tax_pc1_avg<all_tax_pc1_avg_90 & all_tax_pc1_avg>all_tax_pc1_avg_10;
(10051 observations deleted)

. sort prov_py pref_ch mayor_id year;

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size mayor_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_
> tax1_gr_ps rk_gdp_gr_ps (max) mayor_promotion mayor_position_next_year pref_id year (last) prov_id county_type_id mayor_pw_pref
>  mayor_age, by(mayor_id);

. /* Generate nonlinear terms for year in office and age*/
> gen mayor_age2=mayor_age*mayor_age;
(3332 missing values generated)

. gen mayor_tty2=mayor_tty*mayor_tty;

. tab pref_id,gen(prefdm);

      (max) |
    pref_id |      Freq.     Percent        Cum.

          1 |         33        0.40        0.40

. /* Table A5 & A7: Promotion of Party Secretaries upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to the Predecessor in t
> he Same Jurisdiction) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen sec_id=group(dlat dlong ccp_sec);
(2314 missing values generated)

. drop if sec_id==.;
(2314 observations deleted)

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size  sec_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_t
> ax1_gr_ps rk_gdp_gr_ps (max) sec_promotion sec_position_next_year pref_id year (last) prov_id county_type_id sec_pw_pref sec_ag
> e, by(sec_id);

. /* Generate nonlinear terms for year in office and age*/
> gen sec_age2=sec_age*sec_age;
(4285 missing values generated)

. gen sec_tty2=sec_tty*sec_tty;

. /* Delete right censoring: people do not have position change next year in 2007 */
> drop if sec_position_next_year==0;

. /* Delete left censoring: people have position change before 1999 */
> drop if year<1999;

. /* Generate a variable to compare with the previous politician */
> sort county_id year;

. /* Table A6 & A8 Promotion of Government Executives upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to the Predecessor i
> n the Same Jurisdiction) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen mayor_id=group(dlat dlong mayor);
(2524 missing values generated)

. drop if mayor_id==.;
(2524 observations deleted)

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size mayor_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_
> tax1_gr_ps rk_gdp_gr_ps (max) mayor_promotion mayor_position_next_year pref_id year (last) prov_id county_type_id mayor_pw_pref
>  mayor_age, by(mayor_id);

. /* Generate nonlinear terms for year in office and age*/
> gen mayor_age2=mayor_age*mayor_age;
(4813 missing values generated)

. gen mayor_tty2=mayor_tty*mayor_tty;

. /* Delete right censoring: people do not have position change next year in 2007 */
> drop if mayor_position_next_year==0;

. /* Delete left censoring: people have position change before 1999 */

. /* Generate a variable to compare with the previous politician */
> sort county_id year;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen sec_id=group(dlat dlong ccp_sec);

. /* Table A15 & A16: Promotion of Party Secretaries upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to Competitors; by Ag
> e Eligibility for Promotion) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen sec_id=group(dlat dlong ccp_sec);

. /* Table A19 & A20: Promotion of Party Secretaries upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to Competitors; Minor
> ity vs. Non-Minority Jurisdictions) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

. /* Delete minority counties */
> drop if prov_py=="XINJIANG" | prov_py=="TIBET" | prov_py=="NINGXIA";
(2317 observations deleted)

. drop if minority_county==1;
(1433 observations deleted)

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen sec_id=group(dlat dlong ccp_sec);
(1791 missing values generated)

. drop if sec_id==.;
(1791 observations deleted)

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size  sec_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_t
> ax1_gr_ps rk_gdp_gr_ps (max) sec_promotion sec_position_next_year pref_id year (last) prov_id county_type_id sec_pw_pref sec_ag
> e, by(sec_id);

. /* Generate nonlinear terms for year in office and age*/
> gen sec_age2=sec_age*sec_age;
(3692 missing values generated)

. gen sec_tty2=sec_tty*sec_tty;

. tab pref_id,gen(prefdm);

. /* Table A19 & A20: Promotion of Party Secretaries upon Term Completion (Relative Revenue/GDP Performance to Competitors; Minor
> ity vs. Non-Minority Jurisdictions) */
> use CHN_Fiscal_Promtn_Data_County.dta,clear;

> drop if prov_py=="XINJIANG" | prov_py=="TIBET" | prov_py=="NINGXIA";

. drop if minority_county==1;
(1433 observations deleted)

. /* Generate politician id */
> egen mayor_id=group(dlat dlong mayor);
(1771 missing values generated)

. drop if mayor_id==.;
(1771 observations deleted)

. /* Generate per-term measures */
> collapse county_id  log_pop2 rural_pop_pct log_light pool_size mayor_tty rel_gdp_gr rel_all_tax1_gr log_dist_countypref rk_all_
